name: Revenant's Brooch
description: The cursed brooch of a fallen guardian who stalks forever between the veil of life and death.

abilities.name: Phantom Critical
abilities.description: The wielder's attacks have a chance to inflict critical magical damage.
notes: Phantom Critical adds magical attack damage directly to the attack.
Critical strike procs have the following properties: The proc is determined during the unit's attack point.
The proc chance of multiple sources stack. However, when multiple critical strike sources proc simultaneously, the higher critical factor takes precedence.
Displays critical strike values before all damage manipulation sources for camouflaging purposes.
Increases attack damage by an average of 24%.

additionalInfo: Purchasable at the Base Shop, under Weapons
Components required from the Base Shop and Secret Shop
